articles.title: Heritier Lumumba reclaimed his name and found strength in African history. Will it change Collingwood and the AFL? - ABC News
articles.description: Heritier Lumumba's stand for equality forced a review of racism at Collingwood. Now the former AFL star embraces the strength of his African identity and culture.
articles.content:
On May 31, 2020, a sea of people filled the streets of the Fairfax District in Los Angeles. Five police helicopters circled above their heads. Two LAPD squad cars were set alight and burned.
